name: LOST IN ABERRATIONS
description:
Lost in Aberrations is a virtual reality experience inspired by optical art and kinetic art.

This experience is a sensorial travel intented for curious minds that loves to play with their perception. Lost in Aberrations involves retinal persistence and tridimensional sounds that saturate the user of visuals and acoustics stimuli.

http://hugoarcier.com/
http://no130.io/

------

If you are lost, follow the blue light.

The experience ends in the red room.

I give this experience for free. Please be indulgent about the finishing of the project.
It only has been tested for now on i7+Titan X Pascal, it may need some more optimisations for lower configuration. It has been made for HTC Vive, but may also work on Oculus: if you test it, please tell me!

Feel free to send constructive feedback.
------

Windows + HTC Vive Headset + Motion Controllers
